## MomentDateApi.getFormat() method

Gets format string using pseudo format

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFormat(pseudoFormat: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pseudoFormat | string | Pseudo format token, used for obtaining 'date' or 'time' format string |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
